template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a autonomous delivery fleet that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Optimize the delivery fleet by analyzing live data, safely adjusting routes and speeds, monitoring outcomes, and reporting efficiency gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants me to generate a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for an autonomous delivery fleet optimization task. Let me break down their requirements. They mentioned analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements.

I need to make sure all these elements are included concisely. Live data analysis comes first, then adjusting parameters with safety constraints. Monitoring results and reporting improvements should follow. Let me count the words: "Optimize the delivery fleet by analyzing live data, safely adjusting routes and speeds, monitoring outcomes, and reporting efficiency gains." That’s 20 words—fits the limit. Covers all the points without extra details.
